Detailed Description

Driver for a master component

 svt_gpio_driver::new

 virtual function void
 svt_gpio_driver::observed_out_cov
 (  svt_gpio_transaction xact  ) 

Coverage callback method called after a transaction has completed or an interrupt has been detected

xact - A reference to the descriptor for the observed transaction or interrupt The transaction must not be modified.

 virtual task
 svt_gpio_driver::post_input_in_get
 (  svt_gpio_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Called before a transaction begins.

xact - A reference to the descriptor for the transaction that is about to start. Modifying the transaction descriptor will modify the transaction that will be executed.

drop - If set, the transaction will not be executed.

 virtual function void
 svt_gpio_driver::pre_observed_out_put
 (  svt_gpio_transaction xact  ) 

Callback method called after a transaction has completed or an interrupt has been detected

xact - A reference to the descriptor for the observed transaction or interrupt The transaction must not be modified.

Member Attribute Documentation

 uvm_event  attribute
 svt_gpio_driver::EVENT_XACT_CONSUMED

Event triggers when driver consumes the transaction object. At this point, transaction object is not necessarily processed or transmitted on the bus.

 uvm_event  attribute
 svt_gpio_driver::EVENT_XACT_ENDED

Event triggers when the driver has completed a transaction.

 uvm_event  attribute
 svt_gpio_driver::EVENT_XACT_STARTED

Event triggers when the driver has started a transaction.
